name: My Darkest Witch
description:
My Darkest Witch is a survival arena with huge waves of enemies caused by massive infestations of an unholy plague.

You take on the role of a magician, one of the orders of light, who, on his own, is trying to cleanse the earth from the heretical induction of rotten monsters that destroy everything in their path.

Game Features: endless arena, pumping abilities, upgrade weapons, character upgrade, music by ronin143.
